recieveAllCommitteeMembers(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class boundries.AppointTesterBoundary
This method is for getting all the committeeMembers Once the boundary receive it it will initialize the combobox and all the displays.
recieveAllInformationEngineers(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class boundries.SupervisorBoundary
This method is for the controller to send a list of all the information engineers that exists in the DB, for the boundary to update the comboboxes of the analyzers and execution leaders
recieveChangeRequestUpdateResult(int) - Method in class boundries.AppointTesterBoundary
This method is called by the controller after receiving change request update results.
recieveCurrentStep(Step) - Method in class boundries.AnalyzerBoundary
The method gets recievedStep - the analysis current step, and show all the step details in the page filtered by the current step of the change request.
recieveCurrentStep(Step) - Method in class boundries.TesterBoundary
Called by the boundary controller, After retrieving the proper step from the database of the current change request.
recieveEstimatedEndDateUpdateStatus(int) - Method in class boundries.ExecutionLeaderBoundry
this method is used to receive the estimated end date updated status from the controller.
recieveExecutionStep(Step) - Method in class boundries.ExecutionLeaderBoundry
This method is in order to receive the execution step from the controller.
recieveFileList(List<MyFile>) - Method in class boundries.ExtraDetailsChangeRequestBoundary
This method shows all the files that uploaded for this specific request .
recieveFileUploadId(int) - Method in class boundries.UploadChangeRequestBoundary
This method gets the id of the uploaded file as an integer variable, in case the variable is equal to 1 it means that the upload of the file passed successfully, else make a toast and alert the user that the upload failed .
recieveNewTesterStepResult(int) - Method in class boundries.AppointTesterBoundary
This method is called by the controller after receiving new tester step update results.
recieveSubmissionAnswer(int) - Method in class boundries.TimeExtensionBoundary
Get the number of affected rows from the controller.
recieveTimeExtensionCounter(long) - Method in class boundries.TimeExtensionBoundary
Checks if there is already an open time extension.
refreshPage(MouseEvent) - Method in class boundries.ExecutionLeaderBoundry
This methods refresh the execution page.
